1.content: My boss says I'll be |||decommissioned if I let anyone past here.

2.content: Not sure what the big deal is though. I don't want to tell you what you can and can't do.

3.content: I should look for a new job...

repeat.name: NONABOT
repeat.content: Sorry, no matter what, I can't let you into the Great litterbox.

r2.content: Quit staring at me like that. I'm a robot, you can't change my mind.
